atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: The @theme directive is used in Tailwind CSS v4 to define theme variables.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: The @apply directive allows you to apply utility classes to custom CSS selectors.

atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: The @tailwind directive is used to inject Tailwind's base, components, and utilities styles.

atDirectives.name: @custom-variant
atDirectives.description: The @custom-variant directive is used in Tailwind CSS v4 to define custom variants.
